DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety, and dose-response relationship of KLH-2109 compared to placebo in Japanese patients with endometriosis.
DOC.brief_title: Late Phase II Clinical Study of KLH-2109 in Patients With Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: Female patients with endometriosis Patients with clinically significant hepatic, renal, or cardiovascular dysfunction
